entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:23 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 8:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -23.9°C
Wind: SSE 47 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blizzard developing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then sunny. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
